newsitem.title: LATVIA: OLAINFARM LEADS SLOW PRE-MIDSUMMER TRADE.
newsitem.headline: OLAINFARM LEADS SLOW PRE-MIDSUMMER TRADE.

text.p: * Total turnover on Friday was a whisker higher at 51,000 lats against 40,000 lats.
* Bourse index rose by 0.44 points to 380.42, an increase of of 0.12 pct. Rietumu index advanced to 153.1, up by 0.49 pct.
* Blue-chip prices were mixed on a slow pre-midsummer market and Olainfarm showed the biggest turnover of 11,000 lats. Its price seems to have stabilsed at 2.50 lats level, closing at 2.55 lats.
Olainfarm registered the biggest turnover amid slow pre-midsummer trade with mixed prices and few changes.
Total turnover on Friday was a whisker higher at 51,000 lats against 40,000 lats.
The bourse index rose by 0.44 points to 380.42, an increase of of 0.12 pct. Rietumu index advanced to 153.1, up by 0.49 pct.
"Activity was rather low but far better than one could expect on a pre-midsummer session," one dealer told Reuters.
Olainfarm showed the biggest turnover of 11,000 lats. Its price seems to have stabilsed as it closed at 2.55 lats.
"Olainfarm has stabilised somewhat close to 2.50 lats, although fluctuation in a range to 2.10 lats is possible," said Andreta Petersone, a dealer with Hansabank-Latvija.
Kaija cannery, an official list stock, maintained its slow upward movement, adding one santime to 2.15 lats on turnover of 6,815 lats.
"It seems that the price is advancing on good half-year result expectations," Petersone said.
Elsewhere on the official list, leading bank Unibanka also edged up while other stocks remained stable.
The bank added three santimes to 3.33 lats and saw 9,990 lats of shares change hands.
Riga Shipyard lost one santime to 1.33 lats and traded 3,000 lats whilt the Staburadze confectionery and Riga Transport fleet stayed put.
Staburadze registered trade worth 4,519 lats at 2.69 lats and the RTF had volume of 2,638 lats at 1.20 lats.
On a generally slow secondary list the Valmiera Glassfibre and Mangali Shipyard were in demand.
Valmiera slipped to 1.39 from 1.43 lats on 4,726 lats turnover on 4,762 lats turnover and Mangali had volume of 2,398 lats. It lost four santimes to 1.10 lats.
